name: Navagio Beach (Shipwreck Beach)
description: A stunning cove beach with crystal-clear waters, surrounded by towering cliffs and accessible only by boat.

name: Blue Lagoon
description: Turquoise waters and dramatic coastlines make this one of Europeâ€™s most breathtaking swim spots.

name: Table Mountain
description: A flat-topped mountain offering panoramic views over Cape Town and the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Wadi Rum
description: Vast sandstone valleys and red desert landscapes often compared to Mars, popular for camping and jeep tours.

name: Palawan
description: Limestone cliffs, turquoise waters, and hidden lagoons define this tropical paradise ideal for beach lovers and adventurers alike.

name: Alhambra
description: A majestic palace-fortress complex rich in Islamic architecture and Moorish history.

name: Seven Mile Beach
description: Pristine white-sand beach with calm blue waters and luxurious resorts.

name: Bali
description: A volcanic island famed for its forested hills, coral reefs, surf spots, and spiritual temples.
